channel.title: Home on Sam Log
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Sam Log

item.title: About
item.description: hey my name is sam and welcome to my humble site. why does this exist? knowledge is less useful when it is not shared. i began taking more notes about my projects after i was setting up hyprland on a new linux installation and wanted to save how i did things so i could come back later and fix problems if i were to have any. less selfishly, i wanted to have the notes so that i could help other people, if they encounter issues similar to the ones i encountered.
